Server module¶

Server’s module.

Launch: python server.py

  • arguments:

  • -p - Number port. Default 7777

Main server module

Class for check methods

class server.server.Sock¶

Class for create socked

class server.server.Server(addr, port_numb)¶

Main class for server

autorize_user(message, sock)¶

Function for check authorizations user :param message: str :param sock: str :return: None or Raise Error

main_server()¶

Main function for class server :return: messages list

read_request(clients, all_clients, messages)¶

Functon for receiving and processing messages :param clients: str :param all_clients: list :param messages: list :return: dict

send_message(client, response)¶

Function for sending messages :param client: str :param response: str :return: None

write_response(message, w_clients, all_clients)¶

Function for processing response from clients :param message: str :param w_clients: list :param all_clients: list :return:

Class for contacts table

class server.server_db.add_users(name, address, passwd=None, realname=None)¶

function for add user in user table and history table :param name: str :param address: str :param passwd: str :param realname: :return: None

class server.server_db.add_contact(from_name, to_name)¶

Function for add contact in table :param from_name: str :param to_name: str :return: None

class server.server_db.get_contact(from_name)¶

Function for get contact from contacts table :param from_name: str :return: None

class server.server_db.del_contact(from_name, to_name)¶

Function for deleting contacts from contacts table :param from_name: str :param to_name: str :return: None

class server.server_db.get_users¶

Function for get user from Users table :return: list

class server.server_db.get_hash(name)¶
